comment.text: This translation key is used for the label "Spreadsheet" which appears on a button in the "Actions" dropdown menu, allowing users to create a new spreadsheet. It is also used as part of a dialog and links within the application, consistently displaying the term "Spreadsheet". The text should be translated to appear cohesively across these different contexts.

usage.context: {t("Document")}, {t("Spreadsheet")}, {t("Presentation")},

<Text
 fontSize="15px"
 fontWeight="600"
 className="settings_unavailable"
 >
 {t("LogoForEditors", { editorName: t("Common:Spreadsheet") })} (
 {logoUrls[8].size.width}x{logoUrls[8].size.height})
 </Text>
 <div className={styles.logosWrapper}>
 <Logo
 name={logoUrls[8].name}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation "Աղյուսակաթերթ" is a compound word that combines "աղյուսակ" (small sheet) and "թերթ" (sheet/page), essentially meaning 'small sheet' or 'sheet page'. While understandable, it's not the standard or most accurate translation of 'Spreadsheet'. The more common and accurate translation would be something along the lines of 'մարզածաշխարհ' (marzadsxar'h).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using "մարզածաշխարհ" (marzadsxar'h) which is the standard Armenian term for 'Spreadsheet'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation 'ຄຳນວນ' (kham nuan) means 'calculate' or 'compute,' which is not an accurate translation of 'Spreadsheet.' A spreadsheet is a document used to organize data, not necessarily to perform calculations.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more accurate translation might be something like 'ໃບບັນຊີ' (bai ban see), which means 'worksheet' or 'spreadsheet,' or a more descriptive phrase depending on the context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian (Cyrillic) translation 'Прорачунска табела' while conveying the general idea of 'spreadsheet', isn't the most accurate or commonly used term. 'Рачунска табела' is a more direct and widely accepted translation.
The word 'računska' is missing an acute accent. It should be 'računska'.

While 'Elektronik tablo' is a possible translation for 'Spreadsheet', it's a more literal and technical translation. A more common and natural translation would be 'Excel tablosu' (referring to Microsoft Excel) or simply 'tablo' depending on the context.
